originalText.text: I had an amazing experience training with Anthony. What makes his training different is that he teaches you, I had been dealing with my weight for two years. Since training with Anthony I had learned more about my nutrition and proper form. He has a very understanding approach to any challenges you might have, I had successfully reached my weight goal. I highly recommend training with Anthony.

originalText.text: I trained with Anthony for about 6 months last year and the experience was incredible. Anthony is well-read on fitness as well as a great motivator when working out. He keeps you accountable, he pushes you past your limits, and keeps everything very fun and light. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Anthony to anyone who was looking for a trainer.

text.text: I trained with Anthony for about 6 months last year and the experience was incredible. Anthony is well-read on fitness as well as a great motivator when working out. He keeps you accountable, he pushes you past your limits, and keeps everything very fun and light. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Anthony to anyone who was looking for a trainer.

originalText.text:
I trained with Anthony for over a year getting prepared for my wedding. He understood my goals, set up a targeted plan to achieve them, and help motivate me both in the sessions and outside of them. He never limited himself to the time we spent in the studio together to make sure I was hitting my objectives. This included working on my diet / helping monitor what I eat, texts to check-in, etc. In terms of the workouts themselves, Anthony did a great job guiding me to work outs with real impact and educating me about the various fads out there. He never wasted time in the gym on things I could do at home. He really wanted to keep our time together focused on the lifts / movements that require supervision but that lead to gains.

Not only is he a great trainer, he is a great person. I looked forward to the workouts as an opportunity to hang out and talk with Anthony. We developed a real bond over the course of working together and he instilled a new love of "lifting" that I never had before.

I highly recommend Anthony for what he does in the gym and who he is inside and outside the gym.

originalText.text:
Anthony is an amazing personal trainer who is the absolute best in New York City. He is extremely knowledgeable and empathetic, offering clear and helpful coaching to help reach my goals. He is
ensures that each session is effective and enjoyable, and is an incredible motivator. He always pushing me to exceed my expectations and on top of that, he's an all-around good dude. I highly recommend Anthony as a personal trainer!

ensures that each session is effective and enjoyable, and is an incredible motivator. He always pushing me to exceed my expectations and on top of that, he's an all-around good dude. I highly recommend Anthony as a personal trainer!

originalText.text:
I started training with Anthony after a sedentary 2020 and a 10+ year fitness hiatus. And after working him for only a month, I lost the weight and body fat I gained over the previous year; 2 years later, my lifestyle and my body has completely changed and I'm still motivated to continue my progress.

Anthony has been great at helping me plan every aspect of my fitness journey (exercise, sleep, nutrition) at a pace that was comfortable but consistently productive -- I haven't felt like he ever pushed me too hard, but I haven't plateaued either. I was intimidated before I signed up, but am so glad I did and think it's worth every penny--most importantly, every single time I leave a session I feel like I've accomplished something. Highly recommend!
